post.body: Yes thanks. Found one for $10 at Meijer, but I had to go to the one on 28th St. anyway :)
Thought I read somewhere that Plain White T's were playing in RPC, but I must have been mistaken. Besides, there's a country act too
There's some left over pork-fried rice in the fridge at home. It's all yours! ;)
kuteykat Maybe you should install a Twitter client. It would stop the fail, but at least you wouldn't have to sit there hitting refresh ;p
Seems to be cut off at .../foi2008-mi When I search, it looks like it should end in: .../foi2008-michigan!
404 hour performance currently ;)
Is that actually GR Information Technology Professionals, but the T dropped for a cool acronym? Sounds interesting.
This makes me feel my grasp on current technology is slipping: http://tinyurl.com/98cux5
Someone needs to develop an Owner Proximity Alarm app. ;)
You've never seen this mass reach terminal velocity though. It's like the shuttle re-entering the atmosphere ;)
Be careful. If you're out in GH then it may be my ex-wife!
I prefer the philosphy of http://www.bookcrossing.com/
There's likely to be Fail Whales galore NYE. I'm expecting a shoal.
Everyone has Legend, but beyond that I would recommend Natural Mystic.
it was pork fried rice pudding. I don't eat Chinese so I forgot to load it up with MSG and salt ;)
I do fancy a quiet night in, but I am being largely scapegoated too ;)
YOU'RE DOING IT WRONG! It's "BASE"! When you tell clients you want to "touch bases" it sounds perverse!
Forgot both phone and iPod this morning. I feel techically bereft.
Gauntlet is thrown down: Rental skates will beat high-tech-new-bearings-roller-blades. @kuteykat's ass will be handed to her at a time TBD
Carbon steel 12" wok: $10 - http://bkite.com/03lbb
